name: JUL_WAVE
description:
GMTK gamejam 2021 Entry.
This game is made in a free time not entarly in 48h gamejam time, its simple and not ready jet, but you got an idea. Game is ment to be played with friend on the one keyboard. 

DISCLAMER: 
(BUG) Music don't play in Opera Browser.

MAIN GAME SCREEN
===================
LEFT PLYER:
AWSD - Movement | SPACE - Shot

RIGHT PLAYER: 
ARROW KEYS - Movement |  ENTER - Shot

END SCREEN
===========
ESC - Exit App
LMB - Restart Game

GAME GOAL :  kill your game oponent before hi did kill you.
